column1: "question": "What is the email address of the customer with customer ID 101?"
"cypher": "MATCH (c:Customer) WHERE c.gender = 'Female' RETURN count(c) AS female_customer_count"
"question": "List customers with a credit score above 750."
"question": "What is the average income of customers in New York?"
"cypher": "MATCH (c:Customer) WHERE c.state = 'NY' RETURN avg(c.income) AS average_ny_income"
"question": "Which customers have an income greater than 80000 and live in Texas?"
"cypher": "MATCH (c:Customer) WHERE c.income > 80000 AND c.state = 'TX' RETURN c.first_name
"question": "What are the credit scores of all customers in Florida?"
"question": "What is the loan amount for mortgage ID M001?"
"question": "List all mortgages with an interest rate greater than 0.04."
"question": "How many fixed-rate mortgages are currently active?"
"cypher": "MATCH (m:Mortgage) WHERE m.loan_type = 'Fixed' AND m.loan_status = 'Active' RETURN count(m) AS fixed_active_mortgages"
"question": "Find the customer associated with mortgage ID M005."
"question": "What are the loan amounts for all mortgages held by customer ID 102?"
"question": "List all mortgages for properties located in New York state."
"cypher": "MATCH (m:Mortgage) WHERE m.origination_date STARTS WITH '2022' RETURN count(m) AS mortgages_2022"
"question": "What is the average loan term for adjustable-rate mortgages?"
"cypher": "MATCH (m:Mortgage) WHERE m.loan_type = 'Adjustable' RETURN avg(m.loan_term) AS average_adjustable_loan_term"
"question": "Find customers who have more than one mortgage."

column2: count(m) AS num_mortgages WHERE num_mortgages > 1 RETURN c.first_name

column1: "question": "What is the total loan amount for all active mortgages?"
"cypher": "MATCH (m:Mortgage) WHERE m.loan_status = 'Active' RETURN sum(m.loan_amount) AS total_active_loan_amount"
"question": "Which customers have a mortgage with a loan amount over 500000?"
"question": "Find all customers who do not have any mortgages."
"question": "List the mortgage IDs and interest rates for all 'Fixed' type loans."
"question": "What is the highest credit score among customers who have an 'Active' mortgage?"
"cypher": "MATCH (c:Customer)-[:HAS_MORTGAGE]->(m:Mortgage) WHERE m.loan_status = 'Active' RETURN max(c.credit_score) AS max_credit_score_active_mortgage"
